properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 7 at 5:36AM PST until February 8 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning for The Cascade Crest
including Highway 2 between Coles Corner and Stevens Pass, heavy
snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 18 inches with
highest amounts along the Cascade Crest. Also expect winds
gusting as high as 55 mph on exposed ridges. For the Winter
Weather Advisory for The Cascade Crest including Highway 2
between Coles Corner and Stevens Pass, rain at Coles Corner and
snow at Stevens Pass. Additional snow accumulations of up to two
inches this morning.

* WHERE...Mazama, Stevens Pass, and Holden Village.

* WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 4 PM this afternoon
to 10 AM PST Saturday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until
7 AM PST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will fall this evening
impacting more locations including Coles Corner. High
avalanche danger continues at this time.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST THIS MORNING FOR THE CASCADE CREST INCLUDING HIGHWAY 2 BETWEEN COLES CORNER AND STEVENS PASS... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM PST SATURDAY FOR THE CASCADE CREST INCLUDING HIGHWAY 2 BETWEEN COLES CORNER AND STEVENS PASS
